rules_text:
Deathtouch
{2}{V}{V}{V}: If this creature isn't onstage, it takes the stage. [i](Spend a different color of mana on each {V}. Onstage creatures are legendary, get +1/+1, and must be blocked before offstage creatures if able.)[/i]
When this creature takes the stage, you gain 2 life and draw a card.
